text: Mariah Duran (born December 14, 1996) is a goofy-footed American skateboarder. ==Skateboarding== In 2016, Duran went Pro for Meow Skateboards, joining Meow team members Lacey Baker, Vanessa Torres, Adrianne Sloboh, and others. In 2018, Duran won her first Gold medal at X Games Minneapolis in the women’s skateboarding street competition. Duran is among the 16 members of the inaugural U.S.A Skateboarding National Team announced in March, 2019. Duran will compete to qualify for the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games in the Women's Street division. ==References== ==External links== *Skate Girls: Mariah Duran Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:American skateboarders Category:Female skateboarders Category:Sportspeople from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:X Games athletes Category:American sportswomen
title: Mariah Duran
